General.Name: Henan Senyuan Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Senyuan Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of high and low voltage power distribution sets, electrical components in China. It is also involved in research and development, design, installation, production and sales of transformer sets and energy power generation sets; shore power facilities, charging piles, energy conservation and emission reduction equipment; robots, molds and fixtures, automation control equipment; lithium battery packs, battery management systems, rechargeable battery pack products and accessories; and battery-changing cabinet products. The company provides general contracting of electric power projects, technical consulting services; electric power engineering design; and foreign labor services, as well as road machinery cleaning, scouring, spray dust reduction, road general cargo transportation, garbage classification service, and winter snow removal services. In addition, the company offers household garbage cleaning, collection, classification, transportation and treatment; mobile toilet; and sanitation cleaning services, as well as involved in sanitation engineering design; sales, leasing, operation, maintenance, and after-sales services. Henan Senyuan Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Changge, China.
